name: Santa Is Workshop
description:
AsepriteIf the webplayer isn't working/lagging you can download an Windows/Linux executable below. Or try to refresh the page/in a different browser. Chrome preferred.

Play in fullscreen! Game was made for 1920x1080, any other resolution might not work.

Warning! Audio might be a bit loud :o

Backstory

Santa's elves have been lazy and didn't make the presents in time. The children are going mad and Christmas is about to be ruined. It's up to Santa to take matters into his own burly and hairy hands. He have gathered the unfinished toy-parts and has to create the toys the children wish for on the spot.

Info

Made for the Yogscast's Game Jam 2019.

Theme: GIVING
Modifiers: Foleyship Modifier (not the soundtrack)
Engine: Godot 3.1.2
Assets were made in Aseprite

Game/Art by Frans

Music by Isak

Sound effects by both and Carl

Github repo
